mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_study(member_id, title, contents, show_status, tags, category, start_date, end_date, img_path, img_org_name) VALUES(#{member_id}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{show_status}, #{tags}, #{category}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{img_path}, #{img_org_name})
mapper.select:
SELECT study_idx, title, contents, reg_date, show_status, `like`, tags, category, member_id, start_date, end_date FROM tbl_study
ORDER BY `like` desc
ORDER BY study_idx desc
ORDER BY study_idx desc
LIMIT #{page_skip_count}, #{page_size}

SELECT study_idx, title, contents, ts.reg_date, show_status, `like`, tags, category, ts.member_id, tm.name, start_date, end_date, img_path, img_org_name FROM tbl_study as ts inner join tbl_member as tm ON ts.member_id = tm.member_id WHERE study_idx = #{study_idx}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_study SET title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, show_status = #{show_status}, category = #{category}, tags = #{tags} WHERE study_idx = #{study_idx}
